Name: iron sinter production | iron sinter | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/241:Manufacture of basic iron and steel/2410:Manufacture of basic iron and steel
Description: The sintering technology was developed for the treatment of the waste fines of iron ore,;coke, limestone, dolomite and metallurgical wastes. Sinter is used in BF to avoid use of raw flux in furnace, lower thermal load, increase the productivity and reduce coke rate. The best advantage of sinter is that it is self fluxed.  ;;More information can be found in MECON report on sinter - http://www.meconlimited.co.in/writereaddata/MIST_2016/sesn/tech_2/6.pdf;Image Source: http://ispatguru.com/understanding-sinter-and-sinter-plant-operations/;
